TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EndEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EndEventHandler(ar As IAsyncResult)

span.span: The that is the result of the operation.

summary.span: 表示处理异步事件（如应用程序事件）的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles asynchronous events such as application events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当完成异步操作的终止通过回调时，调用此委托通过事件源委托。This delegate is called by the event source when completion of the asynchronous operation is signaled by a callback to the delegate. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用要注册为异步页处理程序委托。The following code example uses the delegate to register a handler for an asynchronous page. [!code-aspx-csharp[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/CS/pageaddonprerendercompleteasynccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/VB/pageaddonprerendercompleteasyncvb.aspx#1)]
